com.netflix.genie.web.rpc.grpc.services.impl.v4

Class GRpcJobKillServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.proto.JobKillServiceGrpc.JobKillServiceImplBase
      • com.netflix.genie.web.rpc.grpc.services.impl.v4.GRpcJobKillServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobKillServiceV4, io.grpc.BindableService

    @ConditionalOnProperty(value="genie.grpc.server.enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
 @GrpcService(value=com.netflix.genie.proto.JobKillServiceGrpc.class,
             interceptors=SimpleLoggingInterceptor.class)
public class GRpcJobKillServiceImpl
extends com.netflix.genie.proto.JobKillServiceGrpc.JobKillServiceImplBase
implements JobKillServiceV4
    Service to kill agent jobs. TODO Register with HeartBeatService to listen for agent stream to become inactive and clean it up.
    Since:
    4.0.0

        Specified by:
